name: Life Current
text: You infuse the current with positive energy. At the start of their turn when the current moves them, living creatures in the current’s area heal 1d6 hit points per 10 feet of the current’s speed (maximum 6d6). Undead creatures in the current instead take an equal amount of damage.
area_zh: 海流 或 者一部分海流, 最宽不超过20尺, 最长不超过100尺
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则减半; 见文本
text_zh: 你向一股海流中注入正能量。在海流推动活物时，位于法术区域内的活物会在自己回合开始的时候恢复每10尺海流速度1d6点生命值（最多6d6）。在海流中的不死生物则会受到等量的伤害。
